FuncDef: The display trustem remote-attestation bd-status command queries the status of remote attestation.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the status of remote attestation on all boards.
-

Displays the status of remote attestation on a specified board.
-

Examples: SlotID   Port     LAK Cert Common Name              Status
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
During the monitoring and maintenance of remote attestation, to query the status of remote attestation, run the display trustem remote-attestation bd-status command.
